Package main.models.devices

Class Device

java.lang.Object
main.models.devices.Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
Computer, Printer
public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object
The Device class represents a generic device in the store. It contains basic properties such as name, description, and ID. This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly. Subclasses should implement the generateId() method to generate a unique ID for each instance.
See Also:
